Sentencas: In this work, four different methods, including polyvinyl alcohol (PVA)-assisted sol-gel process, polyethylene glycol (PEG)-assisted sol-gel process, citrate sol-gel process and oxalate coprecipitation process (OCP) are employed to synthesize the Sm and Nd co-doped ceria electrolyte with the composition of Ce0.85Sm0.075Nd0.075O2-delta (SNDC).
Titulo: Comparative study of Ce0.85Sm0.075Nd0.075O2-δ electrolyte synthesized by different routes

Sentencas: The phase structure of the powders can be well indexed with the fluorite-type CeO2 structure.
Titulo: Comparative study of Ce0.85Sm0.075Nd0.075O2-δ electrolyte synthesized by different routes

Sentencas: The morphology of sintered samples indicates that the ceramics can be highly densified.
Titulo: Comparative study of Ce0.85Sm0.075Nd0.075O2-δ electrolyte synthesized by different routes

Sentencas: The relative density and the average grain size vary with the synthesis processes and the sintering temperatures.
Titulo: Comparative study of Ce0.85Sm0.075Nd0.075O2-δ electrolyte synthesized by different routes

Sentencas: The bulk conductivities are quite close and the OCP-SNDC yields highest grain-boundary conductivities and total conductivities.
Titulo: Comparative study of Ce0.85Sm0.075Nd0.075O2-δ electrolyte synthesized by different routes

Sentencas: The results indicate that the OCP process for the powder synthesis results in higher relative density and conductivities, lower grain-boundary resistance and activation energy.
Titulo: Comparative study of Ce0.85Sm0.075Nd0.075O2-δ electrolyte synthesized by different routes

Sentencas: Grain-boundary space charge potentials for different specimens are calculated based on the Mott-Schottky model.
Titulo: Comparative study of Ce0.85Sm0.075Nd0.075O2-δ electrolyte synthesized by different routes

Sentencas: The synthesis process and sintering temperature have significant effect on the space charge potential and the specific grain-boundary conductivity.
Titulo: Comparative study of Ce0.85Sm0.075Nd0.075O2-δ electrolyte synthesized by different routes
